name: Derelict (itch)
description:
Entry for GBJAM5!

Music and Sound by @commandycan
Game by @Programancer

Meta, testing, and help by @sayomgwtf, @jordizzle, and @MisterFoxInc

Changelog

  • 10/15/16
    • 3 more weapon levels added
    • Fixed bug where end boss and *secret* can't be
      damaged by the upgraded weapons.
  • 10/14/16
    • Autosave feature added
    • Difficulty adjustments on 2nd level
    • Refined boss fight on 2nd level
    • Fixed some progress problems with checkpoint rooms
  • 10/13/16
    • Added a new enemy- The Ceiling Turret
    • Slightly increased difficulty on 2nd boss by adding turrets to the boss room and increasing HP slightly.
    • Weapon levels added. Left slots for future updates.
  • 10/12/16
    • Reduced how often the first boss uses the laser attack to reduce difficulty
    • Added floating debris to the hangar power room.
    • Added floating debris to the introduction.
  • 10/10/16
    • Reduced recoil from gun
    • Fixed collision issues with corners allowing you to zip through walls if they're hit at the perfect velocity.
